duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide expert level analysis of data communications networks, including planning, design, evaluation, selection, and implementation.
Manage performance tuning and capacity planning activities to enhance the performance of associated infrastructure.
Support the acquisition of hardware and software as well as subcontractor services as needed.
Contribute to initiatives aimed at driving down incident rates and troubleshooting when necessary.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in computer science, management information systems, or related technical field. Equivalent related experience and/or education may be substituted for the degree.
